pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vaccine Induced Cellular Immunogenicity with Bivariate Modeling // A shiny app for accurate estimation of vaccine induced immunogenicity with bivariate linear modeling. Method is detailed in: Lhomme, Hejblum, Lacabaratz, Wiedemann, Lelievre, Levy, Thiebaut Richert (2020). Journal of Immunological Methods, 477:112711. doi:10.1016/j.jim.2019.112711.
